title: Why can't i open league?
body:
Just today i wanna to play league and it wouldn't even open not even launch page. 
I'm using macbook by the way/{{item:3073}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
The boards are near dead on OCE. I wouldn't expect someone to reply any time soon.

But I'm here. I'm always here.

What exactly happens when you try to launch League? Do any messages come up or does it do nothing?
nothing its just wouldn't even open lol

Did you update to Yosemite? I hear that League was having some problems on that particular version, though I also heard that it's since been fixed. If changing what version of iOS you have is a breeze for you, then I suggest seeing what happens on both.

If it isn't (I don't use Macs so I'm not too sure whether it's a simple button press or a whole day installation thing) then do the following:
Make sure all of your systems are up to date. This includes your OS, graphics and sound drivers, and anti-virus. Try running League.

If it still fails, turn off your anti-virus and firewall. Try running League again.

If that fails, make sure that your account is an administrator. [Here's an article on doing that.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#mq3)

If absolutely all of that fails, then reinstall your game. Be sure to back up any item sets you may have, and back up your "Config" folder. That way you won't start completely from scratch.

Best of luck.
